pages.text: Position Traps can be bound to any location just like position paper, but after being bound to a location and used, it will be thrown onto the floor.$(br)Anyone who picks it up when thrown this way will be teleported to it's destination.$(br)The trap will also disguise itself as any item held in the offhand when thrown.$(br)This fake item takes a long time to despawn and can take more damage.
